songs.title: Creep
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
What the hell am I doing here?
I don't belong here

[Chorus]
I’m a creep
I'm a weirdo
What the hell am I doing here?
I don't belong here

[Outro]
Mm, she’s running out the door
She's running out
She's run, run, run, run
Run

[Segue]
Everyone feel peaceful tonight? Peace and love that's what music is about. I don't care if it's corny; peace and love
